body:
I have a packages.yaml that defines paths to pre-installed cmake.

packages:
  cmake:
    paths:
      cmake@3.0.2%gcc@6.1.0 arch=darwin-elcapitan-x86_64: /Users/miller86/visit/thirdparty_shared/2.12/cmake/3.0.2/i386-apple-darwin15_clang

but a subsequent spack find cmake command returns nothing.

Either I've crafted packages.yaml incorrectly or spack find should be enhance to return information on packages defined in packages.yaml. The latter makes it possible to affirm contents of packages.yaml is having the intended effect on Spack and so I think it would be useful for spack find to return such information.
title: should spack find return info regarding packages in packages.yaml
